text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Do you two have any plans today～?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Hmm? Why? There something 
interesting going on?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I don't really have any plans 
other than training.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Then how about we throw a hotpot party～?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I'm still not sure what kind of hotpot 
we should make, though……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Oh? Then why don't we see who's got the guts to try mystery hotpot?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Mystery hotpot……! 
I've heard stories of such a dish.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It's some kind of hotpot cooked in the dark, 
stuffed indiscriminately with ingredients both 
edible and those less so……!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: I… I can't allow you to add inedible things!
